LanguageData.DMS_Hound_Base.label: hound recharging station
LanguageData.DMS_Hound_Base.description: A station used for assembling and charging hound drone systems.
LanguageData.DMS_Recharger.label: automatroid recharger
LanguageData.DMS_Recharger.description: Automatroids and colonial-class drones can recharge here. During recharge, this recharger produces toxic wastepacks and stores them internally. Haulers must remove the wastepacks from time to time.
LanguageData.DMS_TrashBin_Base.label: trashbin recharging station
LanguageData.DMS_TrashBin_Base.description: A station used for assembling and charging trashbin service robots.
LanguageData.DMS_VerlingBird_Base.label: verlingbird recharging station
LanguageData.DMS_VerlingBird_Base.description: A station used for assembling and charging verlingbird recon drones.
